Package ZombiesGame.controller

package ZombiesGame.controller
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    Valve
    The Valve interface is implemented by all the inner classes in the Controller class in order to execute their respective functions depending on the Message object passed
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Controller
    The Controller classes connects the game by having direct communication to the model and the view.
    GameInfo
    The GameInfo class contains the data from the model class that we want to bring to the View package.
  • Enum Class Summary
    Enum Class
    Description
    ValveResponse
    The types of responses of a Valve
